article.headline: Ohio 69, Marist 63
article.story: POUGHKEEPSIE, N.Y. (AP) -- Leon Williams and Mychal Green each scored 15 points to lead Ohio to a 69-63 win over Marist Tuesday night. Jeremy Fears and Jeff Halbert added 11 points apiece for the Bobcats (3-0). Jared Jordan led Marist (2-2) with 28 points, while James Smith had 11 points. Ryan Stilphen grabbed 11 rebounds. The Red Foxes used a 10-3 run to take a 17-12 lead in the first half, but Ohio scored 13 straight points and held a 34-28 halftime lead. Green hit one of his four 3-pointers to cap an 8-0 run in the second half to extend the Bobcats' lead to 42-28. But Marist pulled to 50-47 with less than eight minutes left on a free throw by Jordan. With the Red Foxes down 65-63 with 23 seconds remaining, Smith pulled down a rebound after Fears missed a foul shot. But Jordan missed two jumpers on the next possession and the Bobcats sealed the win at the free-throw line.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
